text: Maple River is an unincorporated community in Carroll County, in the U.S. state of Iowa. ==History== A post office was established as Maple River Junction in 1877, and renamed Maple River in 1883; the post office remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1968. The community took its name from a nearby stream lined with soft maple trees. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Carroll County, Iowa Category:1877 establishments in Iowa Category:Populated places established in 1877 Category:Unincorporated communities in Iowa
title: Maple River, Iowa
